trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an operation is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt, or an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes InDoubt.
This exception is thrown when an action is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt.
A transaction is in doubt when the state of the transaction cannot be determined.
Specifically, the final outcome of the transaction, whether it commits or aborts, is never known for this transaction.
This exception is also thrown when an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes InDoubt.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified message.
A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInDoubtException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
